---
title: Bond More Transaction (Optional)
slug: /guides/staking-api/polkadot/delegate/create-bond-more-transaction
---

import Link from "@docusaurus/Link";

Additional tokens can be bonded from your Stash account during the flow, before submitting validator addresses for nomination.

Send a `PUT` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]/next` to proceed to the next step &mdash; signing and broadcasting the bond more transaction.
The required input is an `amount` of DOT.

- Use the `create_bond_more_tx` action when you need to bond extra tokens while the flow state is `bonding_complete`.

- Use the `complete` action when the flow state is `bonding_complete` to advance the flow state directly to `delegated`.

<details>
  <summary>Click here to view example Staking API response</summary>

```json {3,35,60} title="Example response after sucessful bonding transaction"
{
  "id": "2dd1fb5e-d089-4aca-81e9-fb52f2e245d1",
  "state": "bonding_complete",
  "actions": [
    {
      "name": "create_nomination_tx",
      "inputs": [
        {
          "name": "validator_addresses",
          "display": "Validator Addresses",
          "description": "",
          "type": "array_of_strings",
          "validations": [
            {
              "type": "array",
              "options": {
                "allow_empty": false,
                "allow_duplicates": false
              }
            },
            {
              "type": "length",
              "options": {
                "maximum": 16,
                "message": "Cannot have more than 16 validators"
              }
            }
          ],
          "array": false,
          "default_value": null
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "create_bond_more_tx",
      "inputs": [
        {
          "name": "amount",
          "display": "Amount",
          "description": "in DOT",
          "type": "string",
          "validations": [
            {
              "type": "presence",
              "options": {}
            },
            {
              "type": "numericality",
              "options": {
                "greater_than": 0
              }
            }
          ],
          "array": false,
          "default_value": "1.0"
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "complete",
      "inputs": []
    },

      "name": "assign_stash_and_controller_account",
      "inputs": [
        {
          "name": "controller_account_address",
          "display": "Controller Account Address",
          "description": "",
          "type": "string",
          "validations": [
            {
              "type": "presence",
              "options": {}
            }
          ],
          "array": false,
          "default_value": "5EsUYYB1wj2MYkQF1Wrr4gQo8L2v5aRZWjZunxRjFXdUm81k"
        },
        {
          "name": "controller_proxy_account_address",
          "display": "Controller Proxy Account Address",

          "validations": [],

      "raw": "",

      "error": null,

      "block_number": 14742751,
      "proxy": false
    },
    "nomination_transaction": null,
    "bond_more_transaction": null

```

</details>

:::caution note

Figment&apos;s Staking API avoids ambiguity by naming this action `bond_more`.
The underlying [Polkadot extrinsic `bond_extra`](https://paritytech.github.io/substrate/master/pallet_staking/enum.Call.html#variant.bond_extra) belongs to the Staking module of Polkadot.

[Examples of `bond_extra`](https://westend.subscan.io/extrinsic?module=staking&call=bond_extra) can be found on the Subscan block explorer.

:::

### Parameters

- `name` &mdash; `string` The name of the action, `create_bond_more_tx` or `complete`
- `inputs` &mdash; `object`
  - `amount` &mdash; `number` The amount of DOT to bond using an additional bonding transaction (required).

#### Sample cURL request

```bash {5-8}
curl -X PUT 'https://polkadot-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/2dd1fb5e-d089-4aca-81e9-fb52f2e245d1/next' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: <API-KEY>' \
--data '{
    "name": "create_bond_more_tx",
    "inputs": {
        "amount": 1.0
    }
}'
```

### Response

With the bond more transaction created, the flow state becomes `bond_more_tx_signature`. Send the signed payload to the Staking API for broadcast to the network &mdash; or use the `confirm_bond_more_tx_by_hash`
action if you have a completed Bond Extra extrinsic hash and block number. You can find examples of the <Link to="https://westend.subscan.io/extrinsic?module=staking&call=bond_extra">Bond Extra extrinsic</Link> on the Westend testnet

As the transaction progresses towards confirmation, the returned state will be `bond_more_tx_broadcasting`, then back to `bonding_complete`.

Upon transaction finalization, the bond will be complete and you can move on to the next step â€” the nomination transaction.

#### Sample Response

```json {3,6,31,34,47,119,122,136,167-177}
{
  "id": "2dd1fb5e-d089-4aca-81e9-fb52f2e245d1",
  "state": "bond_more_tx_signature",
  "actions": [
    {
      "name": "refresh_bond_more_tx",
      "inputs": [
        {
          "name": "amount",
          "display": "Amount",
          "description": "in DOT",
          "type": "string",
          "validations": [
            {
              "type": "presence",
              "options": {}
            },
            {
              "type": "numericality",
              "options": {
                "greater_than": 0

            }
          ],
          "array": false,
          "default_value": "1.0"

    },

                "reward_destination": "5FNVfA6qhVJBKrG4KCo6CLzvcXVRRdiGpsYHbkzujMUG6JJG",

                "bonding_transaction": {
                  "raw": "",
                  "signing_payload": "",
                  "signed": "",

```

### Submit Signed Bond More Transaction

### Parameters

- `name` &mdash; `string` The name of the action, `sign_bond_more_tx`
- `inputs` &mdash; `object`
  - `transaction_payload` &mdash; `string` The signed bond more transaction payload (required).

#### Sample cURL request

```bash {5-8}
curl -X PUT 'https://polkadot-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/2dd1fb5e-d089-4aca-81e9-fb52f2e245d1/next' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: <API-KEY>' \
--data '{
    "name": "sign_bond_more_tx",
    "inputs": {
        "transaction_payload": ""
    }
}'
```

### Response

With the signed transaction provided, the Staking API will broadcast it to the network. As the transaction progresses towards confirmation, the returned state
will be either:

- `bond_more_tx_broadcasting` â€” The transaction has been broadcasted and is waiting for confirmation.
- `bonding_complete` â€” The transaction is complete and the extra bond is active.

#### Sample Response

```json {3,6,31-41}
{
  "id": "2dd1fb5e-d089-4aca-81e9-fb52f2e245d1",
  "state": "bond_more_tx_broadcasting",
  "actions": [
    {
      "name": "wait",
      "estimated_state_change_at": "2023-02-21T20:04:36.407Z",
      "inputs": []
    }
  ],
  "data": {
    "controller_account_address": "5EsUYYB1wj2MYkQF1Wrr4gQo8L2v5aRZWjZunxRjFXdUm81k",
    "controller_proxy_account_address": null,
    "stash_account_address": "5FNVfA6qhVJBKrG4KCo6CLzvcXVRRdiGpsYHbkzujMUG6JJG",
    "stash_proxy_account_address": null,
    "validator_addresses": null,
    "reward_destination": "5FNVfA6qhVJBKrG4KCo6CLzvcXVRRdiGpsYHbkzujMUG6JJG",
    "amount": "1.0",
    "bonding_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "0x6a967111a86491612dae27bdc6dcbfcd01884c994737e54f0941afffe36f6649",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": [],
      "block_number": 14742751,
      "proxy": false
    },
    "nomination_transaction": null,
    "bond_more_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "0x0601070010a5d4e8000400a424000013000000e143f23803ac50e8f6f8e62695d1ce9e4e1d68aa36c1cd2cfd15340213f3423ee143f23803ac50e8f6f8e62695d1ce9e4e1d68aa36c1cd2cfd15340213f3423e",
      "signed": "0xb901840092460dcf0b9ae6cabf654c1b33f02f52934d1ae262f8db733b470b631c58716501f0c9b3ad094bf8c044128dc3d38edcc04eea8329d84109e8cba4268554e1be3a4c3fd774c3286acbadc2e9f22827d1e7bc173da25742b41bd8916ff29969d0870004000601070010a5d4e8",
      "hash": "0x0c43ec8166870642bc3e7e70213f9b22845a4cdb274524074a9d5aa27da89ca1",
      "status": null,
      "error": null,
      "signatures": [],
      "block_number": 14742812,
      "proxy": false
    }
  },
  "network_code": "polkadot",
  "chain_code": "westend",
  "created_at": "2023-02-21T19:48:20.974Z",
  "updated_at": "2023-02-21T20:03:36.390Z"
}
```
